creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Makiji Hase
description: two travelers, one on horseback crossing bridge, the other in blue garment behind, pass through trees with heavy foliage; small open-walled structure on top of cliff near center; tall mountains in background
markings: URC, square intaglio; URC, square relief
medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Landscape
